body: Hemispheric Brief reports that, "A recent uptick in violence against human rights defenders in the state of Chihuahua continues to be met with impunity and silence by the Mexican government."
original_body: Hemispheric Brief reports that, "A recent uptick in violence against human rights defenders in the state of Chihuahua continues to be met with impunity and silence by the Mexican government."
title: Mexico: Reports of Growing Violence Against Human Rights Activists in Chihuahua
